taM nira#vapaqt tEnaq vai sa dEqvatA$ScEndriqyaM cAvA#rundhaqyadA$gnEqyO$ &ShTAka#pAlO &mAvAqsyA#yAqM Bava#tyaiqndraM dadhi# dEqvatA$Scaiqva tEnE$ndriqyaM caq yaja#mAqnO&va# rundhaq indra#sya vRuqtraM jaqGnuSha# indriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M pRuthiqvImanuq vyA$rcCaqt tadOSha#dhayO vIqrudhO#&Bavaqnthsa praqjApa#tiqmupA#dhAvad-vRuqtraM mE# jaqGnuSha# 
indriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M - [  ]  16
